text: Alex Van Linden (born 5 May 1952) is a Belgian former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Alex Van Linden
